text: What's up everyone? Today we are bringing you

another incredible lesson with the 
songs of none other than Beyoncé.

It's no surprise that Beyoncé is one of 
the most successful recording artists of

all time. In fact, she has sold over 100 
million records worldwide. Not only this,

but she is incredibly talented, not only at 
singing but also at dancing and acting too.

By the way, in case you're new here, we make 
lessons every week to help you learn fast English.

Without getting lost, without missing 
the jokes and without subtitles. In fact,

Andre says that he felt stuck with his English 
but our channel cheered him up. So be sure to hit

that Subscribe button and the Bell down below, 
so that you don't miss any of our new lessons!

So in this lesson we have taken some of Beyoncé's 
best songs to help you learn English slang

and vocabulary. So let's get 
straight into today's lesson.

Do you struggle to understand fast speaking 
natives? Then I highly recommend our Fluent

with Friends course. In this 48-week course you 
will learn with the first seasons of Friends.

You'll receive pdf power lessons every 
week, vocabulary memorization software,

access to our Fluency Circle Global Community 
and so much more! And did you know you can

try it right now for FREE with our 3-Part 
Masterclass? All you have to do is click up

here or in the description box below to learn 
more and sign up now. We hope to see you there!

If you're enjoying this lesson, then I 
highly recommend that you check out our

lesson with Jennifer Lopez next, where you 
can learn Advanced English words and slang.

You can click up here or in the 
description box below to watch that next.
